Articles.Content:
We are approaching V1.0 very quickly but there are still many small things I feel are missing from the game.

One of those small things is advanced options for action group and staging.

By that I mean:

  • Create action groups and drag them to the staging list. (for auto opening solar panels after fairing release. or auto deploy landing legs after abort)
  • Adding time delays to parts in staging list & action groups. (you could theoretically automate your entire launch with this)

I think these would be fairly easy to implement, at least for the UI. Add a option when you right click a staging icon or part. something like this = Delay:[000] (+)(-)

I know if squad are not already planning this then its unlikely to make it in to the final release, but hey, you cant blame a guy for trying.

Small details make a better enjoyment of a thing.

I already wrote this reply to other threads asking nearly the same.

It is a big yes especialy for the ability to add autodoing for pre set things.

I am not lazy but these are forgotten as always type "errors" or fasten up the ordinarily manualy doable things. So it makes more inportant aspects to get more attention.
